Description.Text: The hotel has a large swimming pool, fitness centre with jacuzzi sauna room, and spa. The hotel is very close to the famous entertainment centre of Bangkok. Hotel provides free internet access in the guest rooms start from Deluxe,Business Deluxe and Suite. In the mean time the guest can use free wi-fi in all the hotel publice area, restaurant , swimming pool in the hotel. (11/08SW)

The hotel is located on Rachadapisek Road, in the center of Bangkok's communications, transportation and international business district. The hotel is surrounded by large department stores banks, government offices, foreign embassies, and national cultural and regional conference centres. The hotel is an ideal location for business meetings and seminars. It is close to Sharky, an exciting live music, Karaoke and video famous entertainment centre of Bankok. The shopping complexes of Robinson and Explanade shopping complex are just 2-3 kilometres away.

Business Deluxe room is the newly renovated room with the modern wooden decoration. The rooms are luxuriously decorated in elegant silk and Thai handicrafts to complement the rich wooden panels. The digital bedside panel remotely controls all the room lighting, alarm clock, TV and DVD. Three hands free dialing telephones are available in each room. Guest can get the DVD movie from the library on 16th floor. Digital Safety box is in the closet. Bathrooms has the window blind fitted for both honeymoon couples. Rain shower and better amenities. Separate showers and bath, hair dryer and telephone extensions also the same as superior and deluxe room. Free internet access in room are now available.
The hotel is chocolate and brown colour rectangular 17 storey modern high rise of concrete and glass.

The hotel has a choice of restaurants that serve Thai, Chinese, Japanese and Western food. The Park Cafe specializes in varieties of international cuisine and delicacies, including a reasonably priced buffet lunch. The Garden Court is open for lunch and dinner. The award-winning chef from Hong Kong prepares Chinese food from old Cantonese recipes, as well as delicious sea food with rare sauces. The Mori Gril, open for lunch and dinner, serves traditional Japanese. Big Gio's Bakery sells a large variety of cakes and pastries, freshly baked every day.

The lobby is very large with surprisingly little seating area. It has a lobby lounge, situated in the shadow of a big tree, is open every day at sunset. Here one can relax while sipping cocktails or other favorite beverages and enjoy with live piano music in the evenings.
